*****LEAVE GRAVITY IN THE DUST *****
The best iOS arcade racing game series reaches a new turning point! Perform dynamic, high-speed aerial stunts in an intense driving experience powered by a brand-new physics engine!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- You need to have:

  - Jailbroken iDevice iOS 5+ (required)

  - AppSync for your iOS version (required)

  - AppAddict iOS app installed (optional, but it has so many apps)

- Install the app through AppAddict app (there are other ways too)

- Enjoy :)
